eu.smartdatalake.simsearch.engine.processor.insitu

Class ElasticSearchRestQuery<K extends Comparable<? super K>,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.smartdatalake.simsearch.engine.processor.insitu.ElasticSearchRestQuery<K,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - Type variable representing the keys of the stored objects (i.e., primary keys).
    V - Type variable representing the values of the stored objects (i.e., their values on a given attribute). CAUTION! A default limit of 10000 results per query is typically specified per index in ElastiSearch. This should be altered by the ES administrator.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISimSearch<K,V>, Runnable

    public class ElasticSearchRestQuery<K extends Comparable<? super K>,V>
extends Object
implements ISimSearch<K,V>, Runnable
    Implements functionality for various similarity search queries (numerical, categorical, spatial) against an ElasticSearch REST API.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ElasticSearchRestQuery

        public ElasticSearchRestQuery(HttpRestConnector httpConn,
                              int operation,
                              String filter,
                              String keyColumnName,
                              String valColumnName,
                              String searchValue,
                              int topk,
                              int collectionSize,
                              ISimilarity simMeasure,
                              RankedList resultsQueue,
                              Map<String,HashMap<K,V>> datasets,
                              String hashKey,
                              Logger log)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        httpConn - The HTTP connection that provides access to the data.
        operation - The type of the similarity search query (0: CATEGORICAL_TOPK, 1: SPATIAL_KNN, 2: NUMERICAL_TOPK).
        filter - Optional filter in ES syntax to be applied on data prior to similarity search.
        keyColumnName - Name of the attribute holding the entity identifiers (keys).
        valColumnName - Name of the attribute containing numerical values of these entities.
        searchValue - String specifying the query value according to the type os the search operation (i.e., keywords, a location, or a number).
        topk - The number of the final top-k results.
        collectionSize - The count of candidate entities to fetch.
        simMeasure - The similarity measure to be used in the search.
        resultsQueue - Queue to collect query results.
        datasets - Dictionary of the attribute data available for search.
        hashKey - The unique hash key assigned to this search query.
        log - Handle to the log file for keeping messages and statistics.

    • Method Detail

      • compute

        public int compute(int M,
                   RankedList partialResults)
        Connects to a REST API and retrieves items qualifying to the submitted similarity search request.
        Parameters:
        M - The count of results to fetch.
        partialResults - The queue that collects candidate results obtained from the specified query.
        Returns:
        The number of collected results.

      • formatValue

        private Object formatValue(String id,
                           Object val)
        Formats the given value of an entity according to its data type.
        Parameters:
        id - The object identifier of the entity.
        val - The attribute value of the entity
        Returns:
        The formatted value.

      • appendValues

        public int appendValues(Set<String> identifiers)
        Connects to a REST API to collect attribute values regarding specific object identifiers. These values are appended to the in-memory lookup maintained for this attribute.
        Parameters:
        identifiers - The set of object identifiers (acting as the primary key in the respective database table).
        Returns:
        The number of collected results.

      • run

        public void run()
        Sends the specified similarity search request against the REST API.
        Specified by:
        run in interface Runnable

      • getNextResult

        public List<V> getNextResult()
        Progressively provides the next query result. NOT applicable with this type of search, as results are issued directly to the queue.
        Specified by:
        getNextResult in interface ISimSearch<K extends Comparable<? super K>,V>
        Returns:
        The next available result.
